H0.text: What is the name of Long John Silver's parrot in Treasure Island. Polly

H1.text: What is the name of Long John Silver's parrot in Treasure Island. Blackbeak

H2.text: What is the name of Long John Silver's parrot in Treasure Island. Barnaby

H3.text: What is the name of Long John Silver's parrot in Treasure Island. Captain Flint

A4.text: Long John Silver has a parrot, named Captain Flint in honor—or mockery—of his former captain
